attributes.action: Air Drop Emergency Food, Water, Shelter and Medical Aid to the people of Burma with no further delay and without the permission of the Burmese / Myanmar government who are now guilty of crimes against humanity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir, this is a time when the lives of people come before the letter of international law. 

This is a time when loss of whatever we get from Burma (oil etc) will be worth it to save lives. 

Please have the courage of your morals and save the lives of the remaining people of the delta with direct air drops. 

You are intelligent and resourceful people. It is possible; so please begin before it is too late.

Thank you for reading this petition.

Best Regards, Catherine McKernan

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
